entry.title: The two types of society: Computationally revealing recurrent social formations and their evolutionary trajectories

link.title: The two types of society: Computationally revealing recurrent social formations and their evolutionary trajectories

entry.summary: Human social diversity—ostensibly infinite in its intricacies—may in fact have more finite bounds than previously thought. Cross-culturally and throughout time, it seems that societies repeatedly form into one of two broad "types" in terms of social configuration...
